an6.62:4.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā kosalesu cārikaṃ caramāno mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ yena daṇḍakappakaṃ nāma kosalānaṃ nigamo tadavasari.
an6.62:4.3: Atha kho bhagavā maggā okkamma aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle paññatte āsane nisīdi.
an6.62:4.4: Te ca bhikkhū daṇḍakappakaṃ pavisiṃsu āvasathaṃ pariyesituṃ.
an6.62:5.1: Atha kho āyasmā ānando sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ yena aciravatī nadī tenupasaṅkami gattāni parisiñcituṃ.
an6.62:5.2: Aciravatiyā nadiyā gattāni parisiñcitvā paccuttaritvā ekacīvaro aṭṭhāsi gattāni pubbāpayamāno.
an6.62:5.3: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami;
an6.62:5.5: “kiṃ nu kho, āvuso ānanda, sabbaṃ cetaso samannāharitvā nu kho devadatto bhagavatā byākato:
an6.62:5.6: ‘*āpāyiko devadatto nerayiko kappaṭṭho atekiccho’ti, udāhu kenacideva pariyāyenāti?
an6.62:5.7: Evaṃ kho panetaṃ, āvuso, bhagavatā byākatan”ti.
an6.62:6.1: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an6.62:6.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an6.62:6.4: “idhāhaṃ, bhante, sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ yena aciravatī nadī tenupasaṅkamiṃ gattāni parisiñcituṃ.
an6.62:6.5: Aciravatiyā nadiyā gattāni parisiñcitvā paccuttaritvā ekacīvaro aṭṭhāsiṃ gattāni pubbāpayamāno.
an6.62:6.6: Atha kho, bhante, aññataro bhikkhu yenāhaṃ tenupasaṅkami;
an6.62:6.8: ‘kiṃ nu kho, āvuso ānanda, sabbaṃ cetaso samannāharitvā nu kho devadatto bhagavatā byākato—
an6.62:6.9: āpāyiko devadatto nerayiko kappaṭṭho atekicchoti, udāhu kenacideva pariyāyenā’ti?
an6.62:6.10: Evaṃ vutte, ahaṃ, bhante, taṃ bhikkhuṃ etadavocaṃ:
an6.62:7.1: “So vā kho, ānanda, bhikkhu navo bhavissati acirapabbajito, thero vā pana bālo abyatto.
an6.62:7.2: Kathañhi nāma yaṃ mayā ekaṃsena byākataṃ tattha dvejjhaṃ āpajjissati.
an6.62:7.3: Nāhaṃ, ānanda, aññaṃ ekapuggalampi samanupassāmi, yo evaṃ mayā sabbaṃ cetaso samannāharitvā byākato, yathayidaṃ devadatto.
an6.62:7.4: Yāvakīvañcāhaṃ, ānanda, devadattassa vālaggakoṭinittudanamattampi sukkadhammaṃ addasaṃ;
an6.62:7.7: Yato ca kho ahaṃ, ānanda, devadattassa vālaggakoṭinittudanamattampi sukkadhammaṃ na addasaṃ;
an6.62:8.1: Seyyathāpi, ānanda, gūthakūpo sādhikaporiso pūro gūthassa samatittiko.
an6.62:8.3: Tassa kocideva puriso uppajjeyya atthakāmo hitakāmo yogakkhemakāmo tamhā gūthakūpā uddharitukāmo.
an6.62:8.4: So taṃ gūthakūpaṃ samantānuparigacchanto neva passeyya tassa purisassa vālaggakoṭinittudanamattampi gūthena amakkhitaṃ, yattha taṃ gahetvā uddhareyya.
an6.62:8.5: Evamevaṃ kho ahaṃ, ānanda, yato devadattassa vālaggakoṭinittudanamattampi sukkadhammaṃ na addasaṃ;
an6.62:8.8: Sace tumhe, ānanda, suṇeyyātha tathāgatassa purisindriyañāṇāni vibhajissāmī”ti?
an6.62:9.2: etassa, sugata, kālo yaṃ bhagavā purisindriyañāṇāni vibhajeyya.
an6.62:9.6: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato paccassosi.
an6.62:10.1: “Idhāhaṃ, ānanda, ekaccaṃ puggalaṃ evaṃ cetasā ceto paricca pajānāmi:
an6.62:10.2: ‘imassa kho puggalassa vijjamānā kusalāpi dhammā akusalāpi dhammā’ti.
an6.62:10.3: Tamenaṃ aparena samayena evaṃ cetasā ceto paricca pajānāmi:
an6.62:10.4: ‘imassa kho puggalassa kusalā dhammā antarahitā, akusalā dhammā sammukhībhūtā.
an6.62:10.5: Atthi ca khvassa kusalamūlaṃ asamucchinnaṃ, tamhā tassa kusalā kusalaṃ pātubhavissati.
an6.62:10.7: Seyyathāpi, ānanda, bījāni akhaṇḍāni apūtīni avātātapahatāni sāradāni sukhasayitāni sukhette suparikammakatāya bhūmiyā nikkhittāni.
an6.62:10.8: Jāneyyāsi tvaṃ, ānanda, imāni bījāni vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjissantī”ti?
an6.62:10.10: “Evamevaṃ kho ahaṃ, ānanda, idhekaccaṃ puggalaṃ evaṃ cetasā ceto paricca pajānāmi:
an6.62:10.11: ‘imassa kho puggalassa vijjamānā kusalāpi dhammā akusalāpi dhammā’ti.
an6.62:10.12: Tamenaṃ aparena samayena evaṃ cetasā ceto paricca pajānāmi:
an6.62:10.13: ‘imassa kho puggalassa kusalā dhammā antarahitā, akusalā dhammā sammukhībhūtā.
an6.62:10.14: Atthi ca khvassa kusalamūlaṃ asamucchinnaṃ, tamhā tassa kusalā kusalaṃ pātubhavissati.
an6.62:10.16: Evampi kho, ānanda, tathāgatassa purisapuggalo cetasā ceto paricca vidito hoti.
an6.62:10.17: Evampi kho, ānanda, tathāgatassa purisindriyañāṇaṃ cetasā ceto paricca viditaṃ hoti.
an6.62:10.18: Evampi kho, ānanda, tathāgatassa āyatiṃ dhammasamuppādo cetasā ceto paricca vidito hoti. (1)

an6.62:13.1: Evaṃ vutte, āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an6.62:13.2: “sakkā nu kho, bhante, imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ aparepi tayo puggalā sappaṭibhāgā paññāpetun”ti?
an6.62:13.4: “idhāhaṃ, ānanda, ekaccaṃ puggalaṃ evaṃ cetasā ceto paricca pajānāmi:
an6.62:13.5: ‘imassa kho puggalassa vijjamānā kusalāpi dhammā akusalāpi dhammā’ti.
an6.62:13.6: Tamenaṃ aparena samayena evaṃ cetasā ceto paricca pajānāmi:
an6.62:13.7: ‘imassa kho puggalassa kusalā dhammā antarahitā, akusalā dhammā sammukhībhūtā.
an6.62:13.8: Atthi ca khvassa kusalamūlaṃ asamucchinnaṃ, tampi sabbena sabbaṃ samugghātaṃ gacchati.
an6.62:13.10: Seyyathāpi, ānanda, aṅgārāni ādittāni sampajjalitāni sajotibhūtāni puthusilāya nikkhittāni.
an6.62:13.11: Jāneyyāsi tvaṃ, ānanda, nayimāni aṅgārāni vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjissantī”ti?
an6.62:13.13: “Seyyathāpi vā pana, ānanda, sāyanhasamayaṃ sūriye ogacchante, jāneyyāsi tvaṃ, ānanda, āloko antaradhāyissati andhakāro pātubhavissatī”ti?
an6.62:13.15: “Seyyathāpi vā, panānanda, abhido addharattaṃ bhattakālasamaye, jāneyyāsi tvaṃ, ānanda, āloko antarahito andhakāro pātubhūto”ti?
an6.62:13.17: “Evamevaṃ kho ahaṃ, ānanda, idhekaccaṃ puggalaṃ evaṃ cetasā ceto paricca pajānāmi:
an6.62:13.18: ‘imassa kho puggalassa vijjamānā kusalāpi dhammā akusalāpi dhammā’ti.
an6.62:13.19: Tamenaṃ aparena samayena evaṃ cetasā ceto paricca pajānāmi:
an6.62:13.20: ‘imassa kho puggalassa kusalā dhammā antarahitā, akusalā dhammā sammukhībhūtā.
an6.62:13.21: Atthi ca khvassa kusalamūlaṃ asamucchinnaṃ, tampi sabbena sabbaṃ samugghātaṃ gacchati.

an6.62:16.1: Tatrānanda, ye te purimā tayo puggalā tesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ eko aparihānadhammo, eko parihānadhammo, eko āpāyiko nerayiko.
an6.62:16.2: Tatrānanda, yeme pacchimā tayo puggalā imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ eko parihānadhammo, eko aparihānadhammo, eko parinibbānadhammo”ti.
